mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(S1.GALLERY_SEQ), 0) + 1 AS GALLERY_SEQ FROM GALLERY S1
SELECT GD.GALLERY_SEQ , GD.PAGE_SEQ , GD.FILE_PATH , GD.FILE_NAME , GD.FILE_ETC FROM GALLERY_DETAIL GD WHERE GD.GALLERY_SEQ = #{GALLERY_SEQ}
SELECT A.AUTHOR , A.GALLERY_SEQ , CAST( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GALLERY_DETAIL S1 WHERE S1.GALLERY_SEQ = A.GALLERY_SEQ ) AS INTEGER) AS CNT FROM GALLERY A
